Part VI: The User Interface

This part covers the TADS 3 interpreter’s user interface. TADS 3 provides a powerful set of UI features. The UI is naturally focused on the needs of traditional text-only Interactive Fiction, but goes beyond the limits of text-only games to provide graphics, sound effects, and GUI-style interaction on platforms that support these features.
